business_name: 悉尼餐馆用具商用厨房设备 Catering Sale Sydney
details_html:
銷售各種廚房設備，定制不鏽鋼產品，冷藏庫，抽油煙機，裝修店面。

About Catering Sale

Catering Sale is a family owned company that has been supplying businesses with their catering equipment and commercial furniture needs for over 5 years. Our showroom is displaying a full range of catering equipment for your consideration. We provide decent services to all over the Australia.

Catering Sale - Satisfaction

Our sales team are prepared to assist your requirements from new business to expanding or upgrading your business. Catering Sale guarantees that you will be satisfied by our service, when you purchase products from us.

Custom fabrication

Catering Sale also provide custom fabrication stainless steel products including but not limited to sink, work bench and canopy for your convenience. You can simply let us know desire design, reinforcement and size for your own unique equipment for your business. We guarantee that you will be satisfied by our experienced technical team’s work.

Rent-Try-Buy Finance options

Catering Sale understands many customers want the benefits of rental transactions that may allow equipment to be acquired out of operating budgets and have many finance solutions to assist you with your purchasing needs. We can provide decent assistance for your consideration with Rent-Try-Buy Finance that Silverchef offer as a solution that allows you to keep your options open with flexible terms and options to purchase, return the equipment, continue to rent or upgrade at the end of a 12 month agreement.

Key Benefits

Here are just a some of the great merits your receive when you deal with Catering Sale
• Highest quality of customer Service
• Competitive price with great discount deals
• Professional sales team to assist you with your purchases and answer your enquiries
• We service Australia wide. There is no destination we cannot deliver to
• Access to refrigerator direct as we import our own commercial refrigerator range keeping our prices very competitive
• No business is too big or small. Whether you are a small family restaurant or a large corporate franchise group, we have the ability to service everyone’s needs

business_name: 餐馆家具 咖啡厅家具 中西餐厅桌椅 卡座沙发定制 餐厅家具厂家
details_html:
广州良久家具有限公司（www.cantingzhuoyi.com）是一家集餐饮家具研发，生产，销售，配套服务四位一体的家具企业，专业从事快餐桌椅、食堂餐桌椅、卡座沙发、西餐厅家具、茶餐厅桌椅、主题餐厅家具等餐饮家具，良久家具坚持以“实用＋好用＋耐用”作为产品的研发理念，为国内外知名连锁餐饮企业及企事业单位提供一站式解决方案，十年来，良久已服务了数千家知名餐饮连锁企业及企事业单位，其中餐饮连锁项目有永和豆浆，禧御贡茶，蒙自源，真功夫，表叔茶餐厅，九龙冰室茶餐厅，贝克汉堡，华莱士，乡村基等知名品牌；企事业单位食堂项目有南方航空集团，广州白云国际机场，广铁集团，家乐福，广州城市职业学院，恒大地产，力辉马达等。 展望未来，良久将与所有同行一道，助力中国餐饮产业更高更快发展。

business_name: 韩国专业厨房设备综合供销商 / The Cafe Page
details_html:
About the CAFÉ PAGE

The CAFEPAGE 公司位于悉尼， 是一家专门供应所有厨房设备产品韩国公司。

本公司是一家韩国公司，专门提供所有厨房设备产品，厨房用具和消耗品，包括韩国本地冰箱和寿司机，以及澳大利亚本地产品。

我们公司致力于实现产品选择到售后服务的全方位服务，为客户提供 Best product, Best price, and Best service.

在消费者的立场看，厨房设备的特点应该是性能好，价格优的优秀产品。我们不但在产品上占有优势，送货服务上也是做到了按时送货，处理好包装拆卸的问题及按要求布置好设备。如在使用过程中出现维修问题时我们也会帮助客户代理处理维修问题，以便让我们的客户可以专注于做生意。

如有意向新开饮食店或咖啡店，或者需要更新设备请联系我们，我们公司的宗旨可以帮助您的厨房设备投资实现最大的价值。

感谢我们的新老客户，祝商祺！

www.thecafepage.com.au
info@thecafepage.com.au

business_name: 各大品牌廚具, 華人經營 Australian Beckham Trade P/L
details_html:
专营澳洲本地制造各大品牌炉头，厨具，冰柜，厨柜，烤箱，炸炉，商用微波炉等，品牌包括：LUUS, B&S, COOKON, MOFFA, GOLDSTEIN,BARON, LKK, ALLCATER, BONN, TIGER, HOBART, UNOX, CHEFTOP 等等。并承接大小安装工程，由澳洲政府认可的持牌工匠负责。

Australian Beckham Trade Pty Ltd: Catering Division is a family owned business and in operation since 2007 supplying extensive range of catering equipment to the hospitality industry. With practical hands-on experience in owning and managing restaurants for over a decade, we are more than qualified to give practical and honest advice for your individual needs.

We are committed to deliver reliable, courteous and value for money service~ONE STOP PROFESSIONAL SERVICE for your kitchen from design to construct, fit-out and project management, as well as supply & install.

Our company has expanded over the years due to our good reputation and the quality equipment we sell. We pride ourselves on providing good quality advice, good after sales service and very competitive price.
